title: Voyageurs National Park: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions          Traveling to the Park Voyageurs National Park is located in Northern Minnesota.  The park shares its northern boundary with Canada and lies just west of the Boundary Water Canoe Area Wilderness. The park visitor centers are accessible by car but in order to truly experience the park, one must leave their vehicle behind and access the park by boat.      Maps Find your way before you go. Download a variety of maps including area maps, camping maps, trail maps, day use maps and winter maps and get where you need to be with ease.       Getting Around Learn about the different modes of transportion one may use to get around the park.      GPS Waypoints Download waypoints and coordinates to assist in locating specific locations within the park.
